q: "We've been in regular contact." Star quality Simon Cowell said he'd consider Brits and Americans alike, as long as they could recognise star quality when they saw it. Over the years you've seen a different type of artist emerge, he explained, noting that a certain je ne sais quoi has become just as important as chops. "A good example of that is Lady Gaga . You saw the filibuster, now read the book. The 8 1/2- hour speech given by Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., on Dec. 10 decrying proposed tax cuts is being published by Nation Books as The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class, Bernie Sanders announced Wednesday. The book is to become available in mid-February, while an e-book edition will be available Jan. 28, Nation Books said in a news release. The speech is being published in its

" committee's paperwork says he'll be seeking the 15th District seat. But he now lives in the 11th District again and is registered to vote there, according to 2010 campaign spokesman Bill Lockyer Maxfield. Obviously, no one knows what the outcome of redistricting will be, though there has been significant coverage of the idea that districts should reflect communities of interest, Maxfield said. Joe Simitian , meanwhile, filed a Statement of Intention to run in 2012 for the 21st Assembly District seat won in November by freshman lawmaker Rich Gordon , D-Menlo Park. question the way Aaron Rodgers is playing. Aaron Rodgers will lead Green Bay into the NFC Championship Game at either Chicago or Seattle next weekend. He said he found it "ironic" that he learned about the four men on the same day that Eagles coach Andy Reid announced that convicted dog-fighter Michael Vick would be his starting quarterback- saying in effect that our country is all about second chances. After the four Cambodians were detained, their supporters formed the One Love Movement to Keep Families Together.
